content: this legal text summarizes a notary document from june 15 2004 involving two parties mr vr and mr vs who jointly own multiple real estate units in a building in castelfidardo the document outlines the properties including garages storage rooms and urban areas and their cadastral income the parties agree to end their joint ownership and divide the properties into two shares mr vr receives one share with specific real estate units while mr vs receives the other share with different real estate units the value of each share is determined the document also mentions the current condition and legal status of the properties the parties agree to ensure ownership and freedom from any prejudicial registrations they also agree to repaint the building and replace gutters and downspouts as necessary the document confirms the marital status of the parties and states that the expenses of the deed will be split equally finally the document is signed by the parties and the notary
